message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200. It's a great deal, and I think you'll be thrilled with your purchase.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I believe $150 would be a fair price for me to purchase it.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that $150 is a good price for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $175. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with your purchase.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I think $160 would be a fair price for me to purchase the product.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that $160 is a good price for you, but I'm still not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $170. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with your purchase.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts in negotiating. I think $165 would be a fair price for me to purchase the product.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that $165 is a good price for you, but I'm still not willing to go that low. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $172.50. It's the highest price I'm willing to go, and I think you'll be happy with your purchase.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. I think $170 would be a fair price for me to purchase the product.

Hi Bob, I understand that you're willing to pay $170, but I'm still not comfortable selling the product for that price. I've already compromised a lot, and I need to make sure I get a fair price for my product. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but this will be my final offer. I'll sell the product to you for $172.00. That's the highest price I'm willing to accept.
